Interface TcrSessionListener


  • public interface TcrSessionListener
    The session listener

    • Method Summary

      void onError(int errorCode, java.lang.String errMsg)
      The callback for a session error
      void onEvent(java.lang.String event, java.lang.String message)

    • Method Detail

      • onError

        void onError(int errorCode,
             java.lang.String errMsg)
        The callback for a session error
        Parameters:
        errorCode - The error code of a connection failure
        errMsg - The error message of a connection failure, which may be empty.
        See Also:
        TcrError

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(java.lang.String event,
             java.lang.String message)
        The event notification The SDK event notification (including the cloud message). For more information, see the message definition of the event notification.
        Parameters:
        event - The event type
        message - The message in JSON format defined by the event
        See Also:
        TcrEvent
